trans-unit.source: Identifies the enumerated type properties of a visual style element.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty> enumeration represents a set of enumerated properties that describe visual style elements.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty> values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BackgroundType"></xref> values that specifies how the element's background is drawn.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BorderType"></xref> values that specifies the border type for elements with a filled-border background.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ContentAlignment"></xref> values that specifies how text is aligned in a window caption.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.FillType"></xref> values that specifies the fill type for elements with a filled-border background.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphFontSizingType"></xref> values that specifies when the visual style selects a different glyph font size.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GlyphType"></xref> values that specifies the type of glyph for elements with a bitmap background.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.HorizontalAlign"></xref> values that specifies the horizontal alignment for elements with a fixed size.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.IconEffect"></xref> values that specifies the effect that the visual style will apply to an icon.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageOrientation"></xref> values that specifies how multiple images are arranged in a single image file.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ImageSelectType"></xref> values that specifies when the visual style selects a different multiple-image file to draw an element.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.OffsetType"></xref> values that specifies where an offset is applied to a window element.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.SizingType"></xref> values that specifies how elements with a bitmap background will adjust to fill the bounds.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextShadowType"></xref> values that specifies the type of shadow to add to text.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrueSizeScalingType"></xref> values that specifies when the visual style rescales an element with a fixed size.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VerticalAlignment"></xref> values that specifies the vertical alignment for elements with a fixed size.
